article_title: What to Wear While at an Upscale Summer Locale
article_text:
Q: My husband and I have been invited to stay in the ritzy beach home of new friends where we will be barbecuing, socializing, golfing and the like. Our hosts (the wife is very stylish but down to earth) keep emphasizing casual but say to bring something "a bit nicer" for one special party during our stay. We need to be prepared.

A: What passes for casual in tony locales like West Palm Beach and the Hamptons is decidedly more studied and more fashionista than usual. By all means, ask the wife again what...
